function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Contagious individuals or frequent sneezing in a space","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the importance of ventilation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on lower cost natural ventilation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of antimicrobial particles in paints","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for more research on indoor plant requirements","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective disinfection systems for pathogen control","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nbpi has been adopted in various types of buildings, but its effectiveness in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases like coronaviruses needs to be further studied.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disinfectant fogging systems may pose a health risk if not properly regulated and applied, leading to exposure of building occupants to harmful chemicals.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research and regulation of air-purifying plants may lead to inconsistent efficacy and potential health risks from plant-related allergens or toxins.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of air and surfaces in indoor environments may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combining plastics with antimicrobial substances like copper, silver, and zinc.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on various materials may contribute to the spread of the virus.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of virus deactivation requirements for hvac systems","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of touchless technology and automation may lead to overreliance on these systems and neglect of manual cleaning and disinfection processes, resulting in higher transmission rates of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 virus in crowded places","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on other research topics in healthy building technologies, with emphasis mainly on covid-19 and ventilation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underestimation of the necessity of air disinfection in a wider variety of public settings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Blurred distinction between different pathways of respiratory infections","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less transmission by large droplets and surfaces, and more by the airborne route","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in understanding the transmission pathways of covid-19 leading to ineffective control measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustained decline in the incidence of respiratory diseases, including influenza and measles, but rebounding of rhinoviruses in children after the reopening of schools","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant reduction in aris and other infectious diseases during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Harmful collateral effects on health from non-pharmaceutical interventions npis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psycho-social effects of prolonged npis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of state restrictions leading to increased covid-19 infections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated infection cases due to sensitivity analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the transmission factor eta beta","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quality of data on covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in compliance indicator associated with changes in infection rates","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of restrictions leading to increased infections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergent trends in infection rates despite similar community mitigation measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using web scraping to retrieve covid-19 data from external sources can lead to inaccurate or outdated information.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on a single website for covid-19 data retrieval increases the risk of system failure if the website is down or inaccessible.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security risks when scraping data from external websites, including exposure to malicious code or unauthorized access to sensitive data.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on web scraping for covid-19 data may result in incomplete or inaccurate information, increasing the risk of incorrect diagnosis and decision-making.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on an expert system for early detection of covid-19 may lead to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment, increasing the risk of disease transmission within the community.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of human expert oversight in the decision-making process based on the expert system’s recommendations may lead to errors and adverse consequences in covid-19 management.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on web scraping for covid-19 information","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of person-to-person transmission in indoor environments","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of airborne transmission in public transportation systems","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient emphasis on protection from small, virus-laden, airborne droplets by international health organizations like the who, rehva, and ashrae.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantitatively comparing and concluding the most significant transmission route for viruses in a given situation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gaps in academic literature related to collaboration, technology adoption, and knowledge creation in supply chain management","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited scope of literature search due to use of only one database scopus","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of papers published after 2020 may result in missing recent developments and insights related to supply chain management strategies during and after the covid-19 outbreak","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption about the impact of population vaccination on supply chain and logistics management strategies without concrete evidence","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding about supply chain interactions and effects among stakeholders","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow adoption and diffusion of technology and policy changes across the supply chain, especially among less tech-savvy stakeholders","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of multi-disciplinary workgroups to address prioritized needs and problems in supply chain management","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in demand patterns leading to disruptions in distribution and scm","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"}]}
